name: roon-extension-web-testapp
description: Roon Extension to test Roon API functionality in a Web Browser
author: Roon Labs, LLC

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/browserify app.js -o bundle.js -u xml2js -u ws -t [ babelify --presets [ 'es2015' ] ]
scripts.dev: node_modules/.bin/watchify -d  app.js -o bundle.js -u xml2js -u ws -t [ babelify --presets [ 'es2015' ] ]
